What does “setting a range” mean?

In concentrated liquidity models (like Uniswap v3 or Bluefin), you don’t just dump tokens into a pool.

You choose a price range where you want to provide liquidity.

Your capital only earns fees within that price window.

What does “setting a range” mean?

In concentrated liquidity models (like Uniswap v3 or Bluefin), you don’t just dump tokens into a pool.
